resources.string: Sorry! Your device doesn\'t support speech input

\[version- 'beta-0.02'\] 
 -added support for arduino 
 -added arduino disconnect on destroy 
 -improved sync setting layout 
 -Reformatted Project Structure 
 -added image to nav drawer 
 -corrected empty name in notification permmission access 
 -updated dependencies 
 -added QR code scan to login 
 -added middleware server request timeout to 10 sec 
 -corrected app parser for multi word 
 -added RSA encryption support 
 -corrected crash if contact not found 
 -added wearable settings page 
 -added service flags 
 -added flags for notification and phone state service 
 -gif splash screen 
 -corrected wearable setting ui 
 -added functions to sync setting ui 
 -added notes support 
 -added sync alarm 
 -corrected tts for and stt for notes 
 -corrected new note bug 
 -added get sync val on open sync settings 
 -added alerts on wearable setting 
 -corrected show notes parser

 -added AI Parser

 -added notification listener service 
 -added phone state listener service
